org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.conditions.environment

Class OAuth2ScopeCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.identity.entitlement.EntitlementConditionAdaptor
      • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.conditions.environment.OAuth2ScopeCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntitlementCondition

    public class OAuth2ScopeCondition
extends EntitlementConditionAdaptor
    An implementation of an EntitlementCondition that will check whether the request OAuth2 scopes are sufficient to gain access.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String REQUEST_SCOPE_ATTRIBUTE
      The attribute that should be sent in the environment map for policy evaluation requests against this condition.

        public void validate()

        Description copied from interface: EntitlementCondition
